column7: You can arm yourself with this armed gun that adorns your arm!
Evaporate your enemies with this eco-friendly gun.
This turret can pierce even the strongest of metals.
Used by the elite Space Millitary.
With the kickback on this baby, be careful not to break your arm.
A gun that can change shape? Is that even viable?
This awesome gun is gonna turn up the heat for sure!
It costs 400,000 Space Dollars to fire this gun for 12 seconds.
Does not include Hello Kitty stickers to put on it.
Used by officers to detain Space Criminals.
Used more to look cool and scary rather than be effective at shooting.
Despite its appearance, it actually uses Plasma Pods!
Bringing in the pain in style.
Bulky and chunky for a handgun, but can pierce the hardest of body armor.
Your own portable flamethrower! Set the world on fire!
Small, powerful, accurate, deadly, and versatile. You can become a one man army with this monster.
When working on a space ships plumbing, sometimes you need protection from creatures lurking in the pipes.
A weird looking gun, even by our standards.
Commonly used for welding, it can also serve more dastardly purposes.
